Project Summary

Project Information

FieldValue
NameImage Generator Maven plugin
DescriptionA Maven plugin to generate image files from an XML description of objects. This allows for constructor arguments and client properties, and is useful for creating documentation for Swing look and feel packages, and also for documenting custom components.
Homepagehttp://www.kathrynhuxtable.org/projects/site/imagegenerator-maven-plugin

URLhttp://www.kathrynhuxtable.org
